items.sentence: Why didn't you tell me Mary was so beautiful?
How many foreigners do you have working here?
You're not going to school tomorrow, are you?
Tom and I've been friends since kindergarten.
Tom refused to tell Mary how much he weighed.
Tom doesn't want to know anything about Mary.
Tom should probably not tell Mary to do that.
Tom should be faster at doing that than Mary.
Tom seems convinced that Mary has to do that.
Tom says he thinks Mary would really do that.
